name: Simple Memory
description:
Simple Memory is a match 2 card game with over 100 different levels to test your memory and logic skill on.

No micro transactions, no confusing gem systems, no advertisements, buy it once and play it to your heart's content. Simple Memory is designed to be simple and easy to play anywhere, may you be in bed, on your couch, in a bus, or waiting for an appointment.

Simple Memory, simply practice your memory.
